actors: Central Asia, Caucasus, Albania and Moldova
sentences: Chair Estrada noted a lack of consensus on the proposal from the CACAM group of countries, but said that Parties agree that the countries should be able to access financial resources provided for in UNFCCC decisions.
UZBEKISTAN, for the CACAM group, proposed the definition 'developing countries and other countries not included in Annex I.
' CANADA, with the EU, and opposed by INDIA, said the proposed adjustment in the definition would be required for the CACAM group to gain representation on the Expert Group on Technology Transfer.
enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
